generatedTitle: what is the person who signals a train to start

extractFactDictList.question: When were policemen called?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In the early days of British railways, these individuals were referred to as "policemen" and their key role was to give hand signals to inform engine drivers about the state of the line ahead.

extractFactDictList.question: What was the nationality of the first policemen?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In the early days of British railways, these individuals were referred to as "policemen" and their key role was to give hand signals to inform engine drivers about the state of the line ahead.
